reviews.headline: Looks great, but could taste better
reviews.comment: Protein, iron, and calcium are some of the nutritional benefits associated with cheeseburgers.\nSalad is essentially food for rabbits, so don\'t bother wasting your time.

reviews.headline: THE. BEST. TEX. BURGER. EVER!!!
reviews.comment: We are lucky to live in a glorious age that gives us everything we could ask for as a human race. What more could you need when you have meat covered in cheese nestled between bread as a complete meal.\nFrom smashed patties at Shake Shack to Glamburgers at Honky Tonk, there's a little something for everyone. Some burgers are humble, and some are ostentatious, and you just have to try them all to figure out what you want.

reviews.headline: It's great! More cheese please
reviews.comment: The palatable sensation we lovingly refer to as The Cheeseburger has a distinguished and illustrious history. It was born from humble roots, only to rise to well-seasoned greatness.

reviews.headline: Taste is everything, and this one is really good
reviews.comment: A cheeseburger is more than just a sandwich, it is a wish fulfilled.

reviews.headline: OH MY GOD, I'm in heaven!!
reviews.comment: The last time you had a cheeseburger was too long ago. Try not to drool when you think about the slightly charred, medium-rare meat nestled between soft brioche, cradled in crisp iceberg lettuce and flavour amplifying condiments. Why are you still reading this- go get a cheeseburger.
